item.title: Sparring Forum Rules
item.content:encoded:
This forum is to help people find sparring partners. Here is how this forum should be used.

  1. Create a new post with your character's name in it. You may also include some text like "Seeking sparring partners," but your character's name must be in the original title!
  2. Only 1 character per thread, just to make it easier to track.
  3. People should reply to existing threads with a request to be added. Only request to be added to the thread maker's lists in that thread.
  4. The thread maker should edit his/her post whenever people have been added to their list.
  5. Bumping is permitted, but only if your post is at least 10 posts down from the top and it has not received a reply in 48 hours.
  6. Don't post in someone's thread unless you've already added them for sparring. Posting in 3+ people's threads and then logging off for the night is kind of rude.

Excess posts will be deleted by the moderators. Chatting should occur in other forums, this one is for a highly specialized purpose. Too much clutter and it loses it's value.

Enjoy!
